amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to perform a study, in consultation with the Commodities Futures Trading Commission, of the effects on emerging growth companies of financial speculation on domestic oil and gasoline prices and to forward the results of that study to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-409 to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to perform a study, in consultation with the Commodities Futures Trading Commission, of the effects on emerging growth companies of financial speculation on domestic oil and gasoline prices and to forward the results of that study to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 106).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 106).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
